::: {.course-overview}
# Course Overview

This course provides a basic introduction to the Positron Editor and IDE.

:::


::: {.course-goals}
# Course Goals

* Understand the benefits of using an IDE.
* Successfully install Positron.
* Be familiar with the basic features of Positron. 
* Understand the idea and how to install extensions.
* Learn about configuration options.

:::
